pathAssistantSteps.info:
Next Steps Call:

  • Click Take Ownership
  • Go to Update Case action tab change status to Open - this is to prevent another from working it
  • Review request and work case accordingly


Next Steps Email:

  • Click Take Ownership button to assign the case to yourself
  • Use the Update Case action to set status to Open
  • Review request and work case accordingly

Next Steps Call:

  • Review case with customer
  • If they cancel the request, Take Ownership and Close the case


Next Steps Email: 

  • Action case when the Next Step is due

Next Steps Call:

  • No action required unless the customer is following up on another email request after the case had been worked
  • When the case is opened to view, the status will automatically change to Open or Closed
  • Take Ownership, work and close the case


Next Steps Email: 

  • Review request and work case accordingly
  • When the case is opened to view, the status will automatically change to Open or Closed

Next Steps Call:

  • Review status of case with customer


Next steps Email: 

  • Wait for the action to be performed by the 3rd party

Next Steps Call:

  • Click Take Ownership button to assign the case to yourself
  • Work and close case


Next Steps Email:

  • Wait for the customer’s email reply
  • The customer reply will automatically set the status to Unread

Next Steps Call:

  • If case is owned by YOUR queue or the customer is asking to cancel the request, click Take Ownership button to assign the case to yourself
  • Review request and work case accordingly
  • If case has an owner assigned, leave the case in Working status and review the case with the customer
  • Attempt to transfer customer to the owner. 
  • If not available, send an email to the owner to request a return call per customer request.


Next Steps Email: 

  • If case is owned by a queue, click Take Ownership button to assign the case to yourself
  • Review request and work case accordingly
  • If case has an owner assigned and you are not covering for them, leave the case in Working status
